00050 struct SpeexMode;

00053 #define SPEEX_HEADER_STRING_LENGTH 8
00054 
00056 #define SPEEX_HEADER_VERSION_LENGTH 20
00057 
00059 typedef struct SpeexHeader {
00060    char speex_string[SPEEX_HEADER_STRING_LENGTH];   
00061    char speex_version[SPEEX_HEADER_VERSION_LENGTH]; 
00062    spx_int32_t speex_version_id;       
00063    spx_int32_t header_size;            
00064    spx_int32_t rate;                   
00065    spx_int32_t mode;                   
00066    spx_int32_t mode_bitstream_version; 
00067    spx_int32_t nb_channels;            
00068    spx_int32_t bitrate;                
00069    spx_int32_t frame_size;             
00070    spx_int32_t vbr;                    
00071    spx_int32_t frames_per_packet;      
00072    spx_int32_t extra_headers;          
00073    spx_int32_t reserved1;              
00074    spx_int32_t reserved2;              
00075 } SpeexHeader;
